crawl_website.description: Crawl a website and return structured content from multiple pages.

props.name: url
props.description: The website URL to crawl.

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl.

props.name: depth
props.description: Depth of crawling (distance between base URL path and sub paths).

props.name: format
props.description: Format of the output content.

extract_document.description: Extract structured data from documents using vision-capable AI.

props.name: file
props.description: File URL or base64-encoded file.

props.name: prompt
props.description: The prompt describing what data to extract from the document.

props.name: jsonMode
props.description: Whether to return the result in JSON format.

generate_image.description: Generate images based on a text prompt using AI.

props.name: model
props.description: The model to use for image generation

props.name: prompt
props.description: The text prompt for image generation

props.name: aspect_ratio
props.description: Aspect ratio of the generated image

props.name: num_outputs
props.description: Number of images to generate (1-4)

props.name: seed
props.description: Seed for reproducible results

props.name: output_format
props.description: Format of the generated image

scrape_website.description: Scrapes data from a specified URL and format the result.

props.name: format
props.description: The format of the output

props.name: cleaned
props.description: Whether the output should be cleaned.

props.name: renderJs
props.description: Whether to render JavaScript before scraping.

search_news.description: Search for news articles using Google News.

props.name: query
props.description: The search query for Google News.

props.name: country
props.description: Country code for location bias (e.g., "US" for United States).

props.name: location
props.description: Specific location to focus the search (e.g., "New York, NY").

props.name: language
props.description: Language code for the search results (e.g., "en" for English).

props.name: dateRange
props.description: Filter results by date.

props.name: page
props.description: Page number for paginated results.

web_search.description: Search the web and optionally retrieve content from top results.

props.name: country
props.description: Two-letter country code for location bias (e.g., "US" for United States).

props.name: location
props.description: Specific location to focus the search (e.g., "New York, NY").

props.name: language
props.description: Language code for the search results (e.g., "en" for English).

props.name: dateRange
props.description: Filter results by date.

props.name: page
props.description: Page number for paginated results.

props.name: scrapeResults
props.description: Whether to scrape top search results.

props.name: numResultsToScrape
props.description: Number of top results to scrape (max: 10).

props.name: scrapeFormat
props.description: Format of scraped content

props.name: cleanedOutput
props.description: Whether the scraped output should be cleaned.
